timeline.message: Shutdown lobby watcher on server game cancel
Shutdown server if lobby staging screen is closed

Add system exit callback to close servermodel if program is exited

This ensures that we will remove any listed lobby games if we launch
a server game and then exit the program. If we simply leave the program
we should be sure to actually keep the game listed as we just change
state from running to waiting.
